name: Silent Forest
description:
After waking up from a devastating car crash, you wonder through an eerie forest looking for some help. But what you stumble upon is not of this world. 

In this project, it was my goal to make a scene around a model I had previously made. I put together this small scene to show off the infested tree house model I created.

Warning: Sound is very load and can clip. No in-game option to turn it down.

Additional Assets:

  • Conifers: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/conifers-botd-142076 
  • Book Of The Dead: Environment 
  • Footsteps: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/footsteps-essentials-... 
  • Candles: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/historic/modular-medieval-... 
  • Rocks: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/rock-and-boulders-2-6947 
  • Renault 12TL 1971: https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/car/car/renault-12tl-1971
